definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or become old (cf., acc. to Thes, Ar. d-aquwnun a she-camel that lets her lower lip hang down, v. Lane:968; d-iqnun decrepit man)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[זׇקֵן]] Ge 18:12 + 14 t. (often hard to disting. fr. pred. adj. [[זׇקֵן]] q.v.); 3 fs. [[זׇֽקְנׇה]] Pr 23:22; 2 ms. [[זׇקַנְתָּ]] 1Sa 8:5; [[זׇקַ֫נְתָּה]] Jos 13:1; 1 S. [[זׇקַנְתִּי]] Jos 23:2 + 3 t.; [[זׇקַנְ֑תִּי]] Ge 18:13, Ge 27:2; Impf. [[וַיִּזְקַן]] 2Ch 24:15; —be (or become) old Ge 18:12, Ge 18:13, Ge 19:31, Ge 27:1, Ge 27:2 (all J), 1Sa 2:22, 1Sa 4:18, 1Sa 8:1, 1Sa 8:5, 1Sa 12:2, 1Sa 17:12, 2Sa 19:33, 1Ki 1:1, 1Ki 1:15, 2Ki 4:14; also Ge 24:1 (‖[[בא בימים]]), so Jos 13:1, Jos 13:1, Jos 23:1, Jos 23:2 (‖ here [[בָּאתִי בימים]]), 1Ch 23:1 (‖[[שָׂבַע ימים]]), 1Ch 24:15 (‖ id.); Pr 23:22, Ps 37:25 (opp. ‖[[היה נער]]); note esp. [[זׇקַנְתִּי מִהְיוֹת לאישׁ]] Ru 1:12 I am too old to belong to a man (husband).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: only Impf. 3 ms. [[יַזְקִין]] inchoat. shew age, grow old = senescere Ew:§ 122 c, cf. Di; of youth Pr 22:6; of tree-root Job 14:8.
